story.text: Martial Arts taught at Ninja School:

- TaiJutsu - a blanket term for any unarmed martial art system. At Ninja School we split Taijutsu into two categories; striking & grappling. 

- ShurikenJutsu - the practice of throwing shuriken (ninja stars). At Ninja School we make origami shuriken that the kids use in mindful exercises and battles!

- Kenjutsu - the practice of swordsmanship. Taught by Sensie Tony during Ninja Camps.

YOUTUBE la_XrxJvI2c
[[The Ninja School Way]]. Broadcast on 11 Mar 2019.

We work with primary and secondary schools! Contact us at info@ninjaschool.org.uk for more information.

- Track name: Walking Lightly
- Artist name: Junip
- Edited by: [[Harry Bovill]]
- [https://ninjaschool.org.uk www.ninjaschool.org.uk]

[[The Ninja School Way]]. Broadcast on 11 Mar 2019.

enquiries@ninjaschool.org.uk
www.ninjaschool.org.uk

Martial Arts taught at Ninja School:
TaiJutsu - a blanket term for any unarmed martial art system. At Ninja School we split Taijutsu into two categories; striking & grappling. 

ShurikenJutsu - the practice of throwing shuriken (ninja stars). At Ninja School we make origami shuriken that the kids use in mindful exercises and battles!

Kenjutsu - the practice of swordsmanship. Taught by Sensie Tony during Ninja Camps.

We work with primary and secondary schools! Contact us at info@ninjaschool.org.uk for more information.

Track name: Walking Lightly
Artist name: Junip
Edited by: Harry Bovill

- ShurikenJutsu - the practice of throwing shuriken (ninja stars). At Ninja School we make origami shuriken that the kids use in mindful exercises and battles!

- Kenjutsu - the practice of swordsmanship. Taught by Sensie Tony during Ninja Camps.

We work with primary and secondary schools! Contact us at info@ninjaschool.org.uk for more information.
